name: It's A Blast! (Turbo Hermit)
description:
It's A Blast! is a physics-based, explosive multiplayer jousting game in which you fight your friends by headbutting each other into submission. Every 3 seconds a blast will propel your character forward as you aim for your opponents' buttocks. Use the momentum, environment and pandemonium to your advantage and remain as the last man standing!

Features:
  • Chaotic, physics-based headbutt jousting action!
  • Up to 4 local players
  • 4 characters with their own unique traits
  • 5 unique arenas
  • Both mouse and controller support: only 1 button needed!
  • Extraterrestrial-controlled bots

*WARNING: This game may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. Flashing lights and screenshake can be disabled in the in-game settings.
